message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. This product holds significant value to us at $15,000, but considering its importance to you, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. To start our negotiation, I propose a price of $13,000. This allows us to maintain a fair transaction while ensuring you receive a valuable asset at a reasonable cost. I look forward to your response and hope we can proceed towards a mutually beneficial arrangement.
